text: BurgerFi is an American hamburger restaurant chain. It is aimed at the "better burger" sector of the market. It was founded in February 2011 in Lauderdale- by-the-Sea, Florida. In 2018, the Consumers Union graded the top 25 burger chains in the U.S. on their antibiotic use policies for beef. It was one of the two chains that were given an "A" rating for using beef that was raised without routine use of antibiotics. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:2011 establishments in the United States
title: BurgerFi
